title: Ingest Fox News Competitive Push Alerts from Slack into Snowflake

lastComment.author: Preritt Ameta
lastComment.body: Hi  @preritt.ameta Thank you for reaching out. All applications go through a thorough review and approvals process that may involve legal, Infosec, privacy, and Slack admin teams. Once the reviews and approvals are completed, the apps will become live. The user that submitted the app requests will be updated in Slack directly with the status updates. The screenshot below shows where to locate these updates if you are having difficulty finding them David Pollard    11:57 PM I see these have both entered the initial review process, so there should be updates on both apps with the confirmation. If there is any additional information needed, you'll be notified. For most applications that do not have extensive permission scopes, the reviews are completed in 1-2 days.
